News.Title: Virtual Galaxy Secures ₹20 Crore Contract for 7 Years
News.Summary: Virtual Galaxy has secured a contract worth ₹20 crore, which will be valid for a period of 7 years. The company, which appears to be in the SME (Small and Medium Enterprise) sector, has successfully obtained this significant business deal.

News.Title: Virtual Galaxy Reports Decreased H2 EBITDA and Net Profit
News.Summary: Virtual Galaxy has reported its latest financial results. The company's H2 EBITDA was ₹245 million, down from ₹297 million in the same period last year. Additionally, Virtual Galaxy's net profit decreased to ₹53 million from ₹79 million year-over-year.
